summary: Carradine is an aged vampire who has a bevy of vampiric beauties who lure many of their customers back to his lair. A pair of virile young Navy sailors get mixed up in their shenanigans.
cast: John Carradine|Bruce Fairbairn|Trey Wilson|Karen Stride|Lenka Novak|Katie Dolan|Lex Winter|Leo Martinez|Vic Diaz|Erna Martha Bauman|Mark Campbell|Irving Glick|Tiffany K. Neipe
title: Vampire Hookers
